idioms.reading: たびはみちづれよはなさけ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, a companion; in life, sympathy

idioms.reading: なさけはひとのためならず
idioms.meaning: the good you do for others is good you do yourself

idioms.reading: たびはこころよはなさけ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, companionship; in life, kindness

idioms.reading: たびはなさけ、ひとはこころ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, a companion; in life, sympathy

lessons.japanese: だれもがその囚人に情けをかけた。
lessons.indonesian: Everybody showed sympathy toward the prisoner.

lessons.japanese: 親として誠に情けない状態にありました。
lessons.indonesian: As a parent I was in a truly pitiable state.

lessons.japanese: そのような時逃げるしか考えていない日本国民は情けない。
lessons.indonesian: The Japanese people, thinking only of running away in such times, are pathetic.
No road is long with good company.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は涙を頬に伝わせながら情けを請うた。
lessons.indonesian: She implored mercy with tears running down her cheeks.

lessons.japanese: 人の情けは世にあるとき。
情けは人のためならず。
lessons.indonesian: He who gives to another bestows on himself.

lessons.japanese: 自分の行動を思い出すと情けないよ。
lessons.indonesian: When I think back on what I did, I feel pretty stupid.

lessons.japanese: 私は君のお情けなど少しもいらない。
lessons.indonesian: I don't need any bit of your charity.

lessons.japanese: だれもがその囚人に情けをかけた。
lessons.indonesian: Everybody showed sympathy toward the prisoner.

lessons.japanese: 私は君のお情けなど少しもいらない。
lessons.indonesian: I don't need any bit of your charity.
